items.title: Deja vu as Spirit and Frontier are reportedly once again discussing a merger
items.description: Frontier and Spirit Airlines are reportedly discussing merging for the third time in as many years, as bankrupt Spirit staves off insolvency.

items.title: United Airlines updates app to include real-time boarding updates, other features
items.description: United Airlines announced an updated version of its app with new features, such as a virtual gate display and lounge recommendations based on realtime...

items.title: My top 4 picks for the best cobranded hotel credit card
items.description: It's worth paying the annual fee on many of the best hotel credit cards. Here's my take on four hotel credit cards that could be named the best.

items.title: JetBlue cuts JFK-Amsterdam route, likely done with European growth 'for a while'
items.description: JetBlue won't bring back service from New York JFK to Amsterdam in 2026, but continues to serve the Netherlands from Boston.
